name: Toothbrush Helper 2
description:
Toothbrush helper App for Kids!
Watch your little ones look forward to brushing their teeth.
The toothbrush helper features a very cute HELPER and a progressbar,
so kids know exactly how long they need to brush!
No more quick brush overs.
This is a fun and innovative way to encourage your child to look after their teeth.

Options:
- You can set the timer to 1,2,3 or 4 minutes.
- 6 different cute helpers
